title: Giant longitudinal and transverse magnetothermoelectric effects in a van del Waals semimetal TaCo2Te2
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7129-7134
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01857E, Paper
Zhigang Gui, Ye Yang, Xikai Wen, Yuqing Zhang, Yikang Li, Yanjun Li, Qingyuan Liu, Mingjie Wang, Jianjun Ying, Xianhui Chen
TaCo2Te2 exhibits giant longitudinal and transverse magneto-thermoelectric effects, suggesting its great potential for thermoelectric refrigeration applications.
